prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that looks like a blooming flower with bright colors.
I want a cute Pokemon with a round body and a leafy green top.
Generate a whimsical creature resembling a fruit, combining pink and green shades.
Make a Pokemon that embodies springtime, featuring vibrant colors and floral elements.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a cherry blossom, with a playful and cheerful demeanor.
Design a small, adorable Pokemon that thrives in forests and is associated with plant life.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique shape that represents growth and renewal in nature.
